name: Hopping Tiles Anime piano game
description:
Newly added 2019 anime and kpop piano music
- Demon slayer
- My hero academia
- Seven deadly sins
- One punch man
- Tokyo ghoul
- Attack on titan
- Sword art online
- Fairy tail
- Undertale
- Blackpink
- BTS
- Megalovania

In this anime and kpop tiles music piano game :
-Lots of new 2019 anime piano and kpop piano music.
-Easy search for new anime music, and other songs like undertale, FNAF
-No unlocks and just play straight away any of the many anime, kpop and vocaloid songs.
- Always adding new songs
- Simple gameplay, just keep swiping left or right
